text: Canthon quadriguttatus is a species of Scarabaeidae or scarab beetles. It is found in Brazil, Colombia and Suriname. == References == == External links == * * Canthon quadriguttatus at insectoid.info Category:Deltochilini Category:Beetles described in 1789 Category:Beetles of South America Category:Insects of Brazil Category:Arthropods of Colombia Category:Fauna of Suriname
title: Canthon quadriguttatus
